titles.title: Recognizing the Republic of Poland and philanthropic organizations and individuals for supporting the establishment of the Museum of the History of Polish Jews in Warsaw, Poland.
Recognizing the Republic of Poland and philanthropic organizations and individuals for supporting the establishment of the Museum of the History of Polish Jews in Warsaw, Poland.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Commends Polish President Alexander Kwasniewski and the Government of Poland for their support of the Museum of the History of Polish Jews in Warsaw, Poland, and their commitment to Holocaust education.
Congratulates all involved in building the Museum of the History of Polish Jews to celebrate 900 years of Jewish life in Poland and to commemorate the millions of Polish Jews killed during World War II.
